title: Handle Visas for an International Game
description: A team is scheduled to play a game in another country. The travel manager must ensure all players and staff have the necessary visas.

tasks.description: Determine the visa requirements for the destination country for all players and staff based on their nationalities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of who needs a visa.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary documentation from each person who needs a visa.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all passports and application forms.

tasks.description: Submit the visa applications to the relevant embassy or consulate.
